name: facework
description: Plateforme de cartes de visite professionnelles

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:mongo" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist frontend/dist mongodb-data backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run seed
